Title: Charlie Darwin
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Coleman Herbert, Chad Feehan (executive story editor), Coleman Herbert (executive story editor), Scott Teems (story)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel makes a startling decision, and Amantha is outraged and hurt when Janet defends his choice. Teddy asks a reluctant Tawney for a favor. Jon Stern gains a valuable insight into a client's case. Sheriff Daggett questions Bobby Dean.
